/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is filled with cars and motorcycles, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are mostly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural elements within it.
